subject: Httpunit Logging output into file
msgSnippet: Somebody had given such a snippet to log output from httpunit tests but I cannot use the following code because my httpunit does not contain the Logger Class.
messageBody:
Somebody had given such a snippet to log output from httpunit tests
but I cannot use the following code because my httpunit does not
contain the Logger Class.
What should I do?
//import com.meterware.httpunit.logger.ILogger;
//import com.meterware.httpunit.logger.LogManager;
//private static final ILogger logger =
//LogManager.getLogger(WebResponse.class);
